Package gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.gui

Class ManagerHttpGUI

java.lang.Object
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.core.SuperHttp
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.core.ManagerHttp
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.gui.ManagerHttpGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpInterface
public class ManagerHttpGUI extends ManagerHttp
ManagerHttpGUI extends ManagerHttp and provides GUI-specific functionality for managing Docker containers using HTTP requests. This class allows starting and stopping containers with HTTP requests without displaying messages to the command line. The pullImage method is not implemented in this class.
See Also:
